The reason the deities suggested Citta t: Citta is ethical and of good character
If he makes a wish to become a wheel-turning monarch in the future, his heart’s wish will succeed because of the purity of his ethics
As a proper, principled king he will provide proper spirit-offerings
The training that Citta advised his frie: Have experiential confidence in the Buddha
Have experiential confidence in the teaching
Have experiential confidence in the Saṅgha
Share without reservation all the gifts available to give in our family with those who are ethical and of good character
